title: Maigret's Dead Man
synopsis: As police look into a rash of murders on Picardy farming estates, Inspector Maigret gets a frantic call from an anonymous man who later turns up dead.

title: I, Olga Hepnarova
synopsis: This drama explores the short and difficult life of one of Czechoslovakia's most notorious murderers, who drove a truck into a Prague crowd in 1973.

title: Touchless
synopsis: A teenage girl unable to cope with the abhorrent reality of being the object of her stepfather's desire retreats into the world of her imagination.
